name: Tomscape
description:
Tomscape is an online role-playing game in which you slap rats, frogs, and other players to become the coolest.

Note: a working internet connection is required to play this game.

Disclaimer: There's a very slight chance the game won't work as it's created by an inexperienced networking programmer, of course feel free to refund the game if it does not work for you!



Features
  • 10-60 minutes of playtime (and more if you like to grind for experience).
  • Play online with other people!
  • Defeat sheep, frogs, rats, guards to level up and become a stronger person.
  • Chill in the hot springs.
  • Chat with other players, or yourself.

Controls
  • Left mouse button to move and attack.
  • Return key to toggle the chat, and then just use your keyboard to talk!



Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
